name: ambrose
description:
Ambrose

That is a 15-minute game i made as my first finished project in RPG Maker MV. All the art and music was made by me, and the story as well. The combat system is totally not ripped off from any other famous games about boys who don't leave their rooms. This is also my love letter to all the wonderful RPG Maker games that inspired all my psychological misadventures. Nothing is encrypted so feel free to use the assets if you find any one of them worth something. It's only in portuguese for the time being, but an english translation will follow shortly.

TW: Unconsensual intimacy.

Controls: 

Z and X to confirm or cancel, respectively. SHIFT to change the target group from ally to foe and vice versa. Fullscreen in Options.

Music was made with FL Studio, Art with LibreSprite and Gimp.

Plugins:

YED InvertTarget

Yanfly's CoreEngine

Yanfly's BattleEngineCore

Yanfly's Animated Sideview Enemies

SumRndmDde's Fullscreen Toggle

(Some plugin to remove fullscreen blur, but i've made a mess with the names and can't remember)

HIME ChangeBattleback

SumRndmDde's BattleBackScroll

FogoMax's SVBattlerPosition

MechPen's SharpText

HIME LargeChoices

Victor Engine's BasicModule

Victor Engine's ArrowCursor

Galv's MessageSoundEffects
